channel.title: BIGGEST JAVA CMD TUTORIAL "Delta, Hyperion, PI, Matrix, 667, All!"
channel.description:
:eek: [img]http://i145.photobucket.com/albums/r220/majesstik1/Threads/funny.gif[/img]
[center]VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED: [/center]
[size=12pt]Please realise what you are about to see is copyright: The Real Deal Company owned by: PATeam or Project Amazed Carlos. The following is a self explanatory tutorial for anyone. Please realise your about to see PHOTOS that will shock your life, no matter what...[/size]
[size=8pt]From the Rsps Maker: Carlos comes a greeting return of the saga: PROJECT AMAZED, he gives fan-boy boners from what ever he touches.[/size]
___________________________________________________
[size=14pt]Difficulty: 10/10[/size] [size=10pt]It's so hard, it is a copy and past, explaining Tutorial.[/size]
[img]http://dominiescommunicate.files.wordpress.com/2012/10/challenge_accepted.png[/img]
[size=18pt]STEP 1:DOWNLOADING JAVAJDK:[/size]
[size=18pt]STEP 2:DOWNLOADING A PACKAGE:[/size]
[size=18pt]STEP 3:Editing the 2 Compilers:[/size]
[size=18pt]STEP 4:Running the Compiler + source:[/size]
[size=24pt]DOWNLOADING JAVAJDK:[/size]
First, go to: [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html[/url] , then scroll down until you see:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/kx9ci.jpg[/img]
Second, click the jdk download and scroll down to:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2zoiz9j.jpg[/img]
Three, Click your computer program software. and install. don't acceppt the stupid ads. Just jdk and jdk related.
[size=18pt]IF YOU DON'T KNOW, I ADVISE TO GET MEDICAL ATTENTION IMMEDIATELY THIS IS NOT A DRILL!!![/size]
[size=24pt]DOWNLOADING A PACKAGE:[/size]
First, go to moparscape server downloads and find one OR!!!!
Use mine: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,628095.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,628095.0.html[/url] Revision: 317 Loading 474. Client Type: Project Insanity
Download that and Extract or use whatever you have and download the files.
[size=14pt]*NOTE YOU DO NOT NEED WINRAR, WHO EVER TOLD YOU THIS BULLSHIT LIE DOESN'T KNOW ANYTHING OR BELIEVED SOMEONE WHO BELIEVED SOMEONE WHO SAID THEY NEEDED WINRAR.[/size] [url=http://winrar.com/]http://winrar.com/[/url]
[size=24pt]EDITING THE 2 COMPILERS:[/size]
First, go to source and then right click the cmd or the one with 2 round shape circle thing. Compiler or C&R.
[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/e/ef/Command_prompt_icon_%28windows%29.png[/img]
Second, "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09/bin/javac.exe" that is a example of mine.
Third, go to [size=12pt]Computer > Local Disk (C:) > Program Files > Java[/size]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2rxhg8h.jpg[/img]
Fourth, their should be a folder or 2 of your Jdk. Mine is jdk1.7.0_09 so i well change the compiler edit code to mine.
Fifth, ones you changed it should look like: "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09/bin/javac.exe"
Sixth, if you don't have a jdk then GF you didn't follow this hard challenged Tutorial i advise to get Medical Attention or help.
Seventh, now go to the client sided and edit that compiler and repeat steps 3.
[size=24pt]Step 4:Running the Server:[/size]
First, when your done doing the step 3, just double click the compiler let it wait for it compile, again if it says "cannot find the path" then its the wrong jdk and redo this whole guide.
Second, run the server on the other cmd or if using mine, then type 1 then enter.
Third, The server and client is now up, no errors if using mine.
FINISHED
[img]http://kurtstrenck.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/imalive4.jpg[/img]
CREDITS: 100% Java 100% MICROSOFT DEVELOPERS 100% TINYPIC 100% ME For this shit tut

item.title: BIGGEST JAVA CMD TUTORIAL "Delta, Hyperion, PI, Matrix, 667, All!"
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I had trouble understanding almost everything in this tutorial.
You also forgot to tell people to set their paths with the corresponding JDK and JRE their computer is running on.
You also forgot to provide the alternative to the batch files, known as an IDE, which is much easier than using notepad to program your server, and it auto-compiles.
Oh, and yes, you most definitely should have winrar installed on your computer.
I can’t say that I like this tutorial, but thank you for contributing.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Project_Amazed_Carlo Project Amazed Carlos
item.description:
@Project_Amazed_Carlo wrote:

:eek:

[center]VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED: [/center]

[size=12pt]Please realise what you are about to see is copyright: The Real Deal Company owned by: PATeam or Project Amazed Carlos. The following is a self explanatory tutorial for anyone. Please realise your about to see PHOTOS that will shock your life, no matter what…[/size]

[size=8pt]From the Rsps Maker: Carlos comes a greeting return of the saga: PROJECT AMAZED, he gives fan-boy boners from what ever he touches.[/size]

[size=14pt]Difficulty: 10/10[/size]
[size=10pt]It’s so hard, it is a copy and past, explaining Tutorial.[/size]

[size=18pt]STEP 1:DOWNLOADING JAVAJDK:[/size]

[size=18pt]STEP 2:DOWNLOADING A PACKAGE:[/size]

[size=18pt]STEP 3:Editing the 2 Compilers:[/size]

[size=18pt]STEP 4:Running the Compiler + source:[/size]

[size=24pt]DOWNLOADING JAVAJDK:[/size]

First, go to: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html , then scroll down until you see:

Second, click the jdk download and scroll down to:

Three, Click your computer program software. and install. don’t acceppt the stupid ads. Just jdk and jdk related.

[size=18pt]IF YOU DON’T KNOW, I ADVISE TO GET MEDICAL ATTENTION IMMEDIATELY THIS IS NOT A DRILL!!![/size]

[size=24pt]DOWNLOADING A PACKAGE:[/size]

First, go to moparscape server downloads and find one OR!!!

Use mine: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,628095.0.html
Revision: 317 Loading 474.
Client Type: Project Insanity

Download that and Extract or use whatever you have and download the files.

[size=14pt]*NOTE YOU DO NOT NEED WINRAR, WHO EVER TOLD YOU THIS BULLSHIT LIE DOESN’T KNOW ANYTHING OR BELIEVED SOMEONE WHO BELIEVED SOMEONE WHO SAID THEY NEEDED WINRAR.[/size]
http://winrar.com/

[size=24pt]EDITING THE 2 COMPILERS:[/size]

First, go to source and then right click the cmd or the one with 2 round shape circle thing. Compiler or C&R.

Second, “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09/bin/javac.exe” that is a example of mine.

Third, go to [size=12pt]Computer > Local Disk (C:) > Program Files > Java[/size]

Fourth, their should be a folder or 2 of your Jdk. Mine is jdk1.7.0_09 so i well change the compiler edit code to mine.

Fifth, ones you changed it should look like: “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09/bin/javac.exe”

Sixth, if you don’t have a jdk then GF you didn’t follow this hard challenged Tutorial i advise to get Medical Attention or help.

Seventh, now go to the client sided and edit that compiler and repeat steps 3.

[size=24pt]Step 4:Running the Server:[/size]

First, when your done doing the step 3, just double click the compiler let it wait for it compile, again if it says “cannot find the path” then its the wrong jdk and redo this whole guide.

Second, run the server on the other cmd or if using mine, then type 1 then enter.

Third, The server and client is now up, no errors if using mine.

FINISHED

100% ME For this shit tut
